response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a symbol of craftsmanship and innovation. I am confident that its worth exceeds $10,000, but I am willing to consider your perspective on its value. I am offering you the chance to own this piece at a special price of $15,000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 15000}
